mean_cn: v. 包围，包上；  n. 信封（同“envelope”）
mean_en: to completely cover (someone or something) :to completely enclose or surround (someone or something)
word_etyma: en在...里面 + velop包裹起来 → envelop 包住
short_phrase: envelop the baby in a blanket
sentence: The mother enveloped her baby in a cozy blanket.
sentence_trans: 母亲将她的宝贝包裹在舒适的毛毯里。
